pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)impact: 6, $(br)explosion: 9 on easy, 17 on normal, 25 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Nether    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Ghasts$() can be set on fire, but $(item)Fire$() or $(item)Lava$() does not harm them. They shoot fire balls.
